arts.ttl: Pernille Harder nets late hat-trick as Bayern Munich thrash Arsenal
arts.sum: Pernille Harder scored three times during the final 17 minutes in Munich to down Arsenal.

arts.ttl: Harder scores Bayern hat-trick as Arsenal capitulate in Champions League
arts.sum: Pernille Harder ended her Champions League goal drought to inspire a 5-2 comeback victory for Bayern Munich over Arsenal.

arts.ttl: Jonas Eidevall explains Arsenal's plan to beat Bayern Munich in Champions League
arts.sum: Jonas Eidevall has said Arsenal must "exploit" Bayern Munich's weaknesses to be in with a chance of winning their first group game of the 2024/25 Champions League. This isn't the first time Arsenal have faced Bayern Munich in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Lia Walti on Champions League aspirations
arts.sum: “I think the Champions League is a competition we all want to win. “Bayern is one of the best teams, currently dominating the German league and I think that’s exactly who we want to be measured against,” she said.

arts.ttl: Jonas Eidevall explains what Arsenal must do better after Everton stalemate
arts.sum: Jonas Eidevall has stressed that Arsenal need to '"start quicker next time" after drawing 0-0 with Everton in the WSL over the weekend. Our learning needs to be to start quicker next time."
